analysis.description:
Reentrancy in P4PPool.withdrawTokenShare (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#255-262):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(playToken.transfer(msg.sender,calcTokenShareOf(msg.sender))) (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#260-262)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- round1Donations (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#262)
	- round2Donations (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#262)

PlayToken.withdrawTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#117-124) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#123-124)

PlayToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#20-21)
PlayToken.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#19-20)
PlayToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#21-22)
PlayToken.version should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x7e0c7676be340ee8efb4321abfa4634a7abfb92c.sol#22-24)
